data.name: OS:Memories
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR DISCORD


About the Game

Investigate a computer [/]
You were just the owner of an office, but something piqued your curiosity. Understand what happened to Andy by browsing through his most personal archives and memories. OS: Memories is a short and engaging storyline about the everyday life of a game developer.


Highlights:

  • Immerse yourself in a pleasant and intimate environment through an old computer interface.
  • Immerse yourself in Andy's life story and relive, through messages, memories and notes, the best and worst moments of his life.
  • Figure out Andy's passwords and insight into his deepest deadlocks.

data.short_description: You were just the owner of an office, but something piqued your curiosity. Understand what happened to Andy by browsing through his most personal archives and memories. OS: Memories is a short and engaging storyline about the everyday life of a game developer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6 or later
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
